notes: Multi-system emulator; winget package not available; emulates apple2/apple2p/apple2e/apple2ee/apple2gs; nvram in ~/.mame/nvram
Most popular Windows Apple II emulator; supports II/II+/IIe/Enhanced IIe; legacy .aws format deprecated
Linux port of AppleWin; supports II/II+/IIe/Enhanced IIe; available in AUR as linapple-git; save states via F11/F12
Cycle-accurate emulator; available as snap (clock-signal); supports II/II+/IIe; no documented save state support
